name: Omni (itch) (toby-klauder)
description:
Mac Build may have some issues, if possible use Windows Build.

Shoutout to Ethan Young and Adeline Braun for helping put this game together!

Controls - WASD, click and drag couches and chairs to move them and block Omni-bot

You have 2 minutes to keep a robot who wants to be human away from his targets, he will change target every 20 seconds you keep him away. 

If you hear the alarm and see the indicator, you have 15 seconds to find Omni-Bot and get him away from his target.
